meta.name: Toronto Weekly Events
meta.description: Recurring weekly community events in Toronto

events.name: Tech Pizza Mondays
events.address: 440 Bloor St W, Toronto, ON M5S 1X5
events.description: Weekly tech meetup with pizza. Meet founders, developers, and tech enthusiasts.

events.name: Art Bar Poetry Series
events.description: Canada's longest-running poetry-only weekly reading series.

events.name: Open Mic Night
events.description: Hosted by Kunle. Sign up at 8pm sharp. Two songs per performer, all genres welcome.

events.name: Jazz Trios Night
events.description: Live jazz trio performances at Toronto's beloved whisky bar. 230+ whiskies available.

events.name: Reading Rhythms Toronto
events.address: 39 Prince Arthur Ave, Toronto, ON M5R 1B2
events.description: Social reading parties designed to make it easy for people to gather and read together.

events.name: Chess Night
events.description: Jazz & Chess nights at Toronto's listening bar. Bring your own board or join a game.

events.name: Monday Trivia
events.description: Weekly trivia night. $10/team entry fee donated to a children's center in Ghana. Cash only.

events.name: Vinyl Night (BYOV)
events.address: 1149 Dundas St W, Toronto, ON M6J 1X3
events.description: Bring your own vinyl night. A Dundas West dive bar staple since 2003.

events.name: Jazz Rat Mondays
events.description: Jazz night with Patrick Smith & Co. $10 martinis all night. Former Silver Dollar Room.

events.name: Headscratchers Trivia
events.description: Weekly trivia night at Toronto's top beer bar in Cabbagetown. Reservations required.

events.name: Civic Tech Toronto
events.address: 55 St. George St, Toronto, ON M5S 0C9
events.description: Hacknight format meetup focused on civic tech challenges.

events.name: Hacklab Open House
events.address: 1677 St Clair Ave W, Toronto, ON M6N 1H9
events.description: Toronto's hacker collective opens their doors. Show off projects, ask for help.

events.name: Tuesday Open Mic
events.description: Weekly open mic night at Toronto's 45-year-old cultural institution.

events.name: Open Mic Night
events.description: The best open mic in town. Sign up at 8pm. In the heart of Kensington Market.

events.name: AI Policy Tuesdays
events.address: 30 Adelaide St E, 12th Floor, Toronto, ON M5C 2C5
events.description: Weekly meetup exploring AI policy topics. Part of Toronto's AI safety community.

events.name: Sapphic Tuesdays
events.description: Weekly sapphic community events including Sapphic Salon, craft nights, open mic.

events.name: Trivia Night
events.address: 39 Prince Arthur Ave, Toronto, ON M5R 1B2
events.description: One of Toronto's favourite pub trivia nights. Oldest English pub in Toronto.

events.name: General Trivia
events.address: 600 Bloor St W, Toronto, ON M6G 1K4
events.description: Weekly trivia covering music, movies, TV, celebrities, sports, food, games.

events.name: Headscratchers Trivia
events.description: Weekly trivia night at Toronto's top beer bar in Cabbagetown. Reservations required.

events.name: Trivia Night
events.description: Weekly trivia with rotating drink specials. $50 bar tab for first place.

events.name: Punch Up Comedy
events.description: Weekly stand-up comedy open mic. List starts at 5:30pm.

events.name: Beyond B-SIDE Open Mic
events.description: The spiritual successor of the Wednesday open mic at B-Side. All genres welcome.

events.name: Kinetic
events.description: Free Wednesday night techno. Not-for-profit community dance party. 19+.

events.name: Chess Night
events.address: 1237 Queen St W, Toronto, ON M6K 1L5
events.description: Chess night for everyone—no experience necessary. Boards provided.

events.name: Social Game Night
events.description: Meet new people over board games. $20 admission includes unlimited non-alcoholic drinks.

events.name: Trivia Night
events.address: 1150 Queen St W, Toronto, ON M6J 1J3
events.description: One of the harder trivia nights in the city. $5 to play, winning table gets $100 gift card.

events.name: Brass Facts Trivia
events.address: 40 Hanna Ave, Unit G1, Toronto, ON M6K 0C3
events.description: Traditional pub-style trivia at Liberty Village craft brewery. Audio/visual questions.

events.name: Ecstatic Dance Toronto
events.description: Toronto's leading weekly Ecstatic Dance. Nonverbal, barefoot, alcohol-free.

events.name: Organic Farmers' Market
events.description: Toronto's oldest organic farmers' market. Year-round local produce since 2002.

events.name: AI Safety Thursdays
events.address: 30 Adelaide St E, 12th Floor, Toronto, ON M5C 2C5
events.description: Weekly meetup focused on AI safety research and discussion.

events.name: Karaoke Night
events.description: Karaoke w/ Steve-Oh every Thursday. $5 tall cans. Historic bar since 1927.

events.name: Trivia Night
events.address: 280 Bloor St W, Toronto, ON M5S 1V8
events.description: 10 trivia categories testing pop culture knowledge. $14 cocktails.

events.name: Office Hours
events.address: 440 Bloor St W, Toronto, ON M5S 1X5
events.description: Weekly public gathering for networking and connection. Meet interesting people.

events.name: Jazz & Blues Night
events.description: Live music every Friday at the whisky bar. Over 230 whiskies available.

events.name: Live Music & Comedy
events.description: Not-for-profit venue with diverse music, theatre, and dance. 1400+ events per year.

events.name: Toronto Dance Fridays
events.description: Latin dance social for salsa, bachata, and kizomba. Lessons 8-10pm.

events.name: Salsa Fridays
events.address: 1585 Dundas St W, Toronto, ON M6K 1T9
events.description: Latin night with tropical dinner, cocktails, and live bands. Free dance lessons.

events.name: The Mindful Miles
events.description: Walk 10k-ish steps with wandering conversations. Curious, friendly people.

events.name: The Joy of Writing Together
events.description: Writing session in two groups (reflect or create). Follows The Mindful Miles.

events.name: Farmers' Market
events.description: Toronto's largest year-round farmers market. 100+ local vendors.

events.name: Farmers' Market
events.address: 92-95 Front St E, Toronto, ON M5E 1C3
events.description: Historic market since 1803. Once named world's best food market.

events.name: Underground Night Market
events.address: 235 Queens Quay W, Toronto, ON M5J 2G8
events.description: Food stalls, artisan vendors, live DJs. Free entry.

events.name: Social Game Night
events.address: 600 Bloor St W, Toronto, ON M6G 1K4
events.description: Unplug, unwind, meet new people over board games.

events.name: Live Music & Comedy
events.description: Not-for-profit venue with diverse music, theatre, and dance.

events.name: Salsa Saturdays
events.address: 1585 Dundas St W, Toronto, ON M6K 1T9
events.description: Latin night with tropical dinner, cocktails, and live bands. Free dance lessons.

events.name: Shut Up & Code
events.address: 81 Front St E, Toronto, ON M5E 1B8
events.description: Focused silent coding sessions with networking. All skill levels.

events.name: Sunday Contact Jam
events.description: Running continuously for 35+ years. Contact improvisation dance.

events.name: Sunday Salsa vs Bachata
events.description: Weekly Latin dance social. Lessons start at 6pm, dancing until 11pm.

events.name: Open Mic Jam
events.description: Collaborative space for musicians. All genres welcome.

events.name: Sunday Klezmer Brunch
events.description: Live klezmer music with brunch. A Toronto tradition.

events.name: Antique Market
events.address: 92-95 Front St E, Toronto, ON M5E 1C3
events.description: Over 80 vendors with antiques, collectibles, and vintage finds.

events.name: Sunday Trivia
events.description: Weekly trivia covering culture, history, science. Prizes include drinks and bar tabs.
